question.text: You may wait in a yellow box junction when

explanation.text: The purpose of this road marking is to keep the junction clear of queuing traffic. You may only wait in the marked area when you’re turning right and your exit lane is clear but you can’t complete the turn because of oncoming traffic.

answer.text: oncoming traffic is preventing you from turning right
